title: Naturopathic CE - Online Continuing Education Provider
description: We are the leading provider in online continuing education courses for naturopathic doctors and natural medicine practitioners. Streamlined & pre-approved.
text:
Hello and howdy!
We're Naturopathic CE!
We are a natural medicine online learning oasis.
Our goal is juicy: to create the largest world-wide community of people who love learning natural medicine. A community of like-minded folks.
A community where you belong.
The Details
We offer pre-recorded online natural medicine courses.
Continuing education courses geared for you, whether you're a naturopathic doctor, aromatherapist, homeopath, acupuncturist, massage therapist, herbalist, traditional naturopath, nutritionist, holistic nurse, chiropractor, medical doctor, osteopathic doctor, or maybe many of the above. (We know you're a passionate person with many interests!)
CE Approval
If you need CE, our courses have licensing board approval from across the globe.
24/7 Learning
Courses are available online at your fingertips anytime, anywhere.
Certificates
Certificates of completion available immediately upon finishing your course.
Topics You Love
From botanicals, homeopathy, aromatherapy, nutrition, pharm, and ethics courses.
[View All Courses](/course-catalog)
The Instructors
We are committed to hosting dynamic, expert instructors.
At Naturopathic CE, we know how important your teacher is for your learning experience. Not just the expertise, but also the engagement. Especially for online learning where there isn't an in-person dynamic, we understand the importance of providing you with quality content from engaging instructors who are experts in their field. Instructors like these:
[View All Instructors](/instructors/)
The Topics
We bring you the latest, juiciest, most interesting topics!
If you're like us, you enjoy having a smorgasbord of options to choose from when selecting continuing education courses online! We strive to be an inclusive community of natural medicine practitioners and to bring you variety, depth, and breadth in topics! Topics like:
[View All Courses](/course-catalog)
The Licensing Boards
Our online courses are pre-approved for continuing education.
We love paperwork and submitting all of those CE applications so, if you need CEUs, you can take continuing education courses that you know will count for you. We have approvals for naturopathic doctors, aromatherapists, homeopaths, acupuncturists, massage therapists, and chiropractors. Read each course page for detais. Below are just some of the boards:
[View All Courses](/course-catalog)
The Philosophy
We believe deeply in the healing power of nature.
We believe deeply in you.
We think that learning is amazing! We know that continuing education is often times a requirement - but why does it have to feel like a bore? At Naturopathic CE, you get to take courses that literally make the world a happier, healthier place. Learning is a privilege; knowledge is transformational. We are so honored to support our natural medicine practitioners in being the best practitioners. The world needs you. Literally. Thank you for doing all that you do.
[Learn More About Naturopathic CE](/about/)
Learning is amazing!
Continuing education should be, too.
